title: TDC 2006 -- Extended Deadline Notice
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009130057/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 5.Jan.2006 3.42pm 

===  
**Extended Deadline â€” TDC52 and TDC2 2006 competitions**  
===  
Call for Entries  
TDC52 & TDC2 2006  
The annual typography and type design exhibition competitions of the Type Directors Club

[TDC52 typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009130057/http:/www.tdc.org/calls/tdc522006/index.html)

Jury: Andy Altman, Why Not Associates; Mike Joyce, Stereotype Design; Alexa Nosal, Leap; Emily Oberman, Number Seventeen; Woody Pirtle, Pentagram Design;  
Steve Sandstrom, Sandstrom Design; Brady Vest, Hammerpress; Diego Vainesman, Chairman

[TDC2 2006 type design](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009130057/http:/www.tdc.org/calls/tdc522006/index.html)

Jury: Frank Blokland, Dutch Type Library; Yvonne Diedrich, ydt\_fonts; Mark Jamra, TypeCulture; Teri Kahan, Teri Kahan Design; Ilene Strizver, Chair

Extended Deadline is Friday 13 January 2006  
Entries from 1 January 2005 to 31 December 2005  
(Full guidelines & PDFs at the URLs above)

Entries selected by the juries will be on display at the exhibition opening in New York in the summer of 2006, exhibited in the TDC travelling exhibitions, and published in \_Typography 27\_, the Annual of the Type Directors Club.
author: Miss Tiffany
